m_szDocTitle: Foxconn's Gou urges patience as iPhone maker's sales slow
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Foxconn's Gou urges patience as iPhone maker's sales slow Share June 26 2014 Tim Culpan Foxconn Technology Group Chairman Terry Gou asked shareholders to give him time to invest in new businesses including car electronics and cloud computing as he chases clients such as Tesla Motors amid slowing sales. "Please be patient, don't be in a hurry," Gou said Wednesday at the annual meeting of Hon Hai Precision Industry, Foxconn's largest unit.
